library.description: JavaScript color conversion and manipulation library
library.name: Color

library.description: Fast, small color manipulation.  Extremely flexible string parsing allows string input of colors in hex, names, rgb, hsl, and hsv - see the demo page to try out the parsing.  Provides color conversion and color scheme utilities.
library.name: TinyColor

library.description: An immutable Javascript color object that works in the browser and NodeJS with support for RGB, HSV, HSL and CMYK. Complete with alpha channel support in all color spaces and implicit color space conversion when getting/modifying a color channel from a different color space.
library.name: one.color

library.description: This plugin implements an extensiv color parser and a featureful set of color-manipulation methods. There is also an animate() extension to smooth CSS colors. Another useful method isReadable() completes the whole, by allowing you to check if a text is readable on a certain background. The color value can also be passed in different color models: RGB, HSV/HSB, HSL and their adequate alpha extensions.
library.name: xcolor

library.description: The color2color function simply converts Hex/RGB/RGBA/HSL/HSLA/HSV color strings to Hex/RGB/RGBA/HSL/HSLA/HSV color strings.
library.name: color2color

library.description: colorjs provides simple API that may be used to create colors (RGBA, HSVA, HSLA) and perform various color related operations (conversions and such).
library.name: colorjs

library.description: Parse, convert and manipulate colours (also known as colors) in JavaScript
library.name: colour.js

library.description: Very fast color interpolation in Javascript
library.name: rainbow-dash

library.description: A lib for easily translating and manipulating colors and sets of colors centered around xterm-256 pallette
library.name: Repl-Rainbow

library.description: Spectra is a Javascript library for quickly manipulating and converting colors.
library.name: Spectra

library.description:
This small javascript library is designed for developers, who have no talent and time to create professional color palettes. Pick a base color, build a transformation chain, and if you haven't choosen too weird parameters, the result will be satisfactory.

Documentation comes with live examples, parameters can be adjusted. Create a complex palette with only 3 lines of JavaScript code!
library.name: KolorWheel.js

library.description: A flexible, intuitive Javascript color manipulation library
library.name: pusher.color

library.description:
simple Color library

you can manipulate colors formats
library.name: aColor.js

library.description: Chroma.js is a JavaScript library for working with colors in visualizations. In contrast to many similar libraries it supports advanced color models like CIE Lab and Hue-Chroma-Lightness which are helpful to overcome the traps of equidis­tant HSV col­ors (for why you may care, see https://vis4.net/blog/posts/avoid-equidistant-hsv-colors/ and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Labcolorspace ). Also it includes support for color scales and the beautiful palettes by Cynthia Brewer.
library.name: chroma.js
